name: WindowsServiceManager
description: Deploys a Windows Service to an Agent or a Deployment Group Target using WinRM.
author: MDSolutions

inputs.name: DeploymentType
inputs.label: Deployment Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deploy with an Agent or a Deployment Group.

inputs.name: Machines
inputs.label: Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a comma separated list of machine IP addresses or FQDNs. Or provide output variable of other tasks. Eg: $(variableName).

inputs.name: AdminLogin
inputs.label: Admin Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Administrator login for the target machines.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for administrator login for the target machines. It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'. You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: NewPsSessionOptionArguments
inputs.label: Session Option parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Advanced options for remote session (New-PSSessionOption). For example, -SkipCACheck, -SkipCNCheck, -SkipRevocationCheck etc. For a complete list of all session options, see [this](https://aka.ms/Vsts_PS_TM_v3_NewPSSessionOptions)

inputs.name: UseSSL
inputs.label: Use SSL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select HTTPS instead of HTTP for WINRM.

inputs.name: ServiceName
inputs.label: Service Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The exact name of the windows service installed on the deployment group target.

inputs.name: ArtifactPath
inputs.label: Artifact Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the windows service artifact.

inputs.name: TimeOut
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of seconds to wait for the service to stop.

inputs.name: StopProcess
inputs.label: Stop Process
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to stop the process if the service does not respond within the timeout limit.

inputs.name: CleanInstall
inputs.label: Clean Install
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to delete all files from the Windows Service parent directory prior to deployment of the artifact.

inputs.name: StartService
inputs.label: Start Service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to start the service after installation.

inputs.name: InstallService
inputs.label: Install Service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to install the windows service.

inputs.name: InstallationPath
inputs.label: Installation Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the path to the executable file.

inputs.name: RunAsUsername
inputs.label: Run As Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the username the service should run as.

inputs.name: RunAsPassword
inputs.label: Run As Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the password for the Run As Username. It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'. You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: InstallTopShelfService
inputs.label: Install as a TopShelf service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to install the windows service as a TopShelf service.

inputs.name: InstanceName
inputs.label: Instance Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the TopShelf instance. [More Information](https://github.com/Topshelf/Topshelf)
